text: E! on Monday revealed the top five finalists in each category of the newly minted E! People ’ s Choice Awards ( airing Sunday, November 11 at 9 / 8c ). All told, Grey ’ s Anatomy and Shadowhunters lead the field with five nominations a piece. Fellow scripted series 13 Reasons Why and Riverdale are close behind ( with four nominations each ), followed by The Big Bang Theory and This Is Us ( with three nominations each ). Of Grey ’ s Anatomy ‘ s five nominations, two are for leading lady Ellen Pompeo ( who is nominated for both Drama TV Star and Female TV Star ), while another two are for the series itself ( which is nominated for both TV Show and the more specific Drama TV Show category ).
